org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class MetricApi

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.MetricApi

public class MetricApi
extends java.lang.Object

The Hyperic HQ Metric API.

This class provides access to the Metrics, MetricTemplates, and MetricData within the HQ system. Each of the methods in this class return Response objects that wrap the result of the method with a ResponseStatus and a ServiceError that indicates the error if the response status is ResponseStatus.FAILURE.

                           throws java.io.IOException
Deprecated. See getMetrics(org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.types.Resource, boolean)

Get all Metrics associated with a Resource

Parameters:
resource - The associated Resource which the metrics belong.
Returns:
ResponseStatus.SUCCESS if the metrics were successfully retrieved.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.

getMetricData

public MetricDataResponse getMetricData(int metricId,
                                        long start,
                                        long end)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Deprecated. See MetricDataApi.

Get the MetricData for the given Metric

Parameters:
metricId - The id of the Metric to query.
start - The start time to query, in epoch-millis.
end - The end time to query, in epoch-millis.
Returns:
ResponseStatus.SUCCESS if the data was succesfully queried. The returned data can be retrieved via MetricDataResponse.getMetricData().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.

getMetricData

public MetricsDataResponse getMetricData(int groupId,
                                         int templateId,
                                         long start,
                                         long end)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Deprecated. See MetricDataApi.

Get the MetricData for the given Group and MetricTemplate.

Parameters:
groupId - The id of the compatible Group to query.
templateId - The id of the MetricTemplate to query for data. The template must belong to the ResourcePrototype for the passed in compatible group.
start - The start time to query, in epoch-millis.
end - The end time to query, in epoch-millis.
Returns:
ResponseStatus.SUCCESS if the data was succesfully queried. The returned data can be retrieved via MetricsDataResponse.getMetricData().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.

getMetricData

public MetricsDataResponse getMetricData(int[] resourceIds,
                                         int templateId,
                                         long start,
                                         long end)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Deprecated. See MetricDataApi.

Get the MetricData for the given list of Resources and MetricTemplate.

Parameters:
resourceIds - The list of Resources to query. It is required that all Resources in this list are of the same ResourcePrototype.
templateId - The id of the MetricTemplate to query for data. The template must belong to the ResourcePrototype for the passed in resources.
start - The start time to query, in epoch-millis.
end - The end time to query, in epoch-millis.
Returns:
ResponseStatus.SUCCESS if the data was succesfully queried. The returned data can be retrieved via MetricsDataResponse.getMetricData().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.

reschedule

public StatusResponse reschedule(java.util.List<Resource> resources)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Reschedule metrics for the given list of Resources. If the passed in List has child resources, those Resources will also be rescheduled.

Parameters:
resources - A List of Resource's to reschedule.
Returns:
ResponseStatus.SUCCESS if the metrics were successfully retrieved.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.
